channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Bitcoin Suisse explains why Swiss is a crypto pivot point: Davos 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: Bitcoin Suisse CEO emphasizes importance of "Swiss quality" and "safe custody for crypto industry."

item.title: CoinDesk could be up for grabs as parent company DCG scrambles for funds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: DCG has reportedly received offers for CoinDesk exceeding $200 million in recent weeks, which at a purchase price of $500,000 would be a 39,900% return on its initial investment.

item.title: Aussie ‘Big 4’ bank mints stablecoin for carbon trading and remittances
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.category: Australia and New Zealand Banking Group
item.description: This marks the second “Big Four” bank in Australia to launch an Australian-dollar pegged stablecoin in a bid to boost the digital economy.

item.title: C-C-C-Combo breaker: Bitcoin ends ‘ridiculous’ 14-day winning streak
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Bitcoin was on the road to breaking a nearly 10-year-old record but the price dip over the past day put a stop to the multi-day win streak.

item.title: CFTC commissioner: Crypto exchanges shouldn’t ‘self-certify’ tokens
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Commissioner Christy Goldsmith Romero wants crypto exchanges blocked from self-certifying crypto and crypto products before going live on their platforms.

item.title: Soaring growth of Ethereum layer-2 networks set to continue in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Leading layer-2 networks on Ethereum have seen a surge in daily active users and fees recently.

item.title: Ripple CEO: XRP lawsuit resolved by June, SEC conduct ‘embarrassing’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse said the firm’s XRP lawsuit could come to an end within “single-digit months.”

item.title: FTX CEO fights to keep lawyers as calls for removal intensify
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: Numerous parties have objected to the retention of Sullivan & Cromwell as lead counsel to FTX, citing conflicts of interest and insufficient disclosures.

item.title: ConsenSys slashes headcount 11% as chief economist reveals formula for adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: ConsenSys CEO Joseph Lubin confirmed the company would be cutting 96 of its staff to focus its resources on its core businesses.

item.title: SBF says Sullivan & Cromwell contradicted itself with insolvency claims
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The former FTX CEO says the exchange’s new attorneys are not taking into account customer bank balances

item.title: Digital Dollar Project urges US to take action on CBDC development
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The foundation set up by “Crypto Dad” Christopher Giancarlo released a new version of its CBDC white paper with new warnings about maintaining U.S. leadership.

item.title: FTX profited from Sam Bankman-Fried’s inflated coins: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Former FTX CEO allegedly used his popularity to lure developers, and Alameda Research to inflate the price of certain coins.

item.title: Media startup says it will buy back $10 million SBF stake: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The company had disclosed the investment on Dec. 2, but had previously not committed to returning the funds.

item.title: Why is the crypto market down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: The crypto market is down today after the U.S. government cracks down on Bitzlato and stocks begin to give back some of their gains from the start of the year.

item.title: Bitzlato kept a low profile, but did not go entirely unnoticed before DOJ action
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Hong Kong crypto exchange with strong ties to Russia was a blip on Chainalysis’ radar last year, with its takedown seen as anticlimactic by many in the crypto community.

item.title: Logan Paul unveils CryptoZoo recovery plan: Nifty Newsletter, Jan 11–17
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Professionals working within the NFT space spoke about the NFT gaming trends to watch out for in 2023.

item.title: Ethereum price rally under question after ETH slams into resistance at $1.6K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: ETH price continues to encounter resistance at the $1,600 level, a potential sign that the current rally lacks sustainable momentum.

item.title: Spain’s central bank approves euro-linked token pilot as part of sandbox initiative: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: To use the tokens, users will need to verify their identity through phone and video identification, and load their wallet with real euros.

item.title: Price analysis 1/18: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, DOT, LTC, AVAX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Positive U.S. economic data initially propped up crypto and stock markets, but it appears that bulls lack the might to keep the rally rolling.

item.title: Genesis is planning to file for bankruptcy: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Another one bites the dust? A report suggested an initial bankruptcy filing from Genesis could come before February.

item.title: Binance registers as virtual asset service provider in Poland
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: In compliance with new regulatory requirements, Polish users will have to sign new terms and conditions with Binance Poland in order to continue using the company’s services.

item.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum correct amid Bitzlato takedown, tech layoffs and economic worries
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ray Salmond
item.category: why is the crypto market falling
item.description: U.S. regulators’ announcement of action against Bitzlato, a softening stock market and a new wave of tech layoffs resulted in an abrupt correction in the crypto market.

item.title: Rarible adds marketplace builder for Polygon-based NFT collections
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Rarible CEO Alexei Falin argued that community marketplaces would become the future of NFT buying and selling.

item.title: FTX fallout: SBF trial could set precedent for the crypto industry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The FTX saga is set to enter its next phase in October with the start of SBF’s trial. However, industry experts are concerned that prosecutors could use him to set an example.

item.title: Bitzlato and its founder face enforcement actions from US authorities
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Department of Justice, Treasury Department and French law enforcement seized many of Bitzlato’s resources, alleging the firm helped launder $700 million in illicit funds.

item.title: Deal Box launches $125M blockchain and Web3 venture fund
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The firm previously specialized in tokenizing equity and bond issuance for startups.

item.title: Bitcoin sees new 4-month high as US PPI, retail data posts ‘big misses’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: A further boost to crypto markets precedes the Wall Street open, but order books are warning of “fading” upside.

item.title: WEF 2023: CBDCs need to find a ‘real problem’ to solve, says SARB governor
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The central bank governor highlighted that the South African Reserve Bank would rather follow than become a first mover in retail CBDCs.

item.title: Crypto Mason’s death threats from maxis: Hall of Flame
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons

item.title: Crypto miner explains how Bitcoin mining stabilizes grids
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: Hut 8 CEO Jaime Leverton explains how Bitcoin mining can stabilize grids, create jobs and generate tax revenues in an exclusive Davos interview.
